config_file.title: Config File
config_file.text: Selecting a configuration file will update all other fields and variables in this GUI.

schedule_file.title: Schedule File
schedule_file.text: Choose a schedule to control stimulus presentation.

calibration_file.title: Calibration File
calibration_file.text: Select a calibration file associated with the stimulus in the selected schedule

data_output_file.title: Data Output File
data_output_file.text: Update the data output filename. Determines where to write the ABR data. Use the dropdown box to select a different file to write to in the same directory.

data_output_directory.title: Data Output Directory
data_output_directory.text: Select a directory to output the ABR data. Use the dropdown to select a recently used directory.

num_sweeps.title: Number of Sweeps
num_sweeps.text: Number of sweeps to present before moving to the next row in the schedule.

sweep_rate.title: Sweep Rate
sweep_rate.text: Frequency at which to present stimuli.

num_repetitions.title: Number of Repetitions
num_repetitions.text: Number of times to present each row before moving on

advance_on.title: Advance Schedule Criterion
advance_on.text: Criterion to advance to the next row in the schedule. Click the "< Define >" option to select a custom function.

advance.title: Advance Schedule Row
advance.text: Click to advance to the next schedule row (or next sweep if # Repetitions > 1).

repeat.title: Repeat Schedule Row
repeat.text: Click to repeat the current stimulus presentation. Click the button again to deactivate.

acquire.title: Start/Stop Acquisition
acquire.text: Use to toggle acquisition of ABR.

filter.text: Set high-pass and low-pass frequency corner of a digital acquisition filter. The filter can be enabled/disabled using the switch.

notch_filter.text: Set digital notch-band filter for line noise rejection.
